=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 6, col = 2)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 2)

Given the current state of the game, your avatar is at (6, 2) and has not moved from the last position. According to the strategy, since your position has not changed, you should analyze the surroundings to choose a different action than last time to maximize your chances of success. 

In the area around your avatar (6, 2):
- To the left (6, 1) is an empty space (b).
- To the right (6, 3) is also an empty space (b).
- Above (5, 2) is empty (b).
- Below (7, 2) is empty (b).

You have multiple options to move in any direction. Moving in any of these directions will keep you safe as there are no harmful sprites nearby.

Since we want to explore and the strategy indicates using movement wisely, I will choose to move **down** to (7, 2).

``` Action:3 ```
This action moves your avatar down to (7, 2) and helps explore the area further while avoiding any immediate threats. I expect to see potential advantageous interactions with citizens in the following turns.
